"@free 13 minutes 13 sec!!!!!! C'est le temps ENCOREEEEE UNE FOIS PERDU à attendre après free pour résoudre un problème récurent !! INCOMPÉTENCE !!!! Ils ne répondent jamais!!!!! https://t.co/2FdeQbWjHg"", "final_json": {"status": "error", "raw_response": "import json

def validate_results(results):
    utile = False
    if 'utile' in results:
        utile = results['utile']
    
    categorie = ''
    if 'categorie' in results:
        categorie = results['categorie']

    sentiment = ''
    if 'sentiment' in results:
        sentiment = results['sentiment']

    type_probleme = ''
    if 'type_probleme' in results:
        type_probleme = results['type_probleme']

    score_gravite = 0
    if 'score_gravite' in results:
        score_gravite = results['score_gravite']
    
    status = 'success'
    if 'status' in results:
        if results['status'] == 'error':
            status = 'error'

    return {
        "utile": utile,
        "categorie": categorie,
        "sentiment": sentiment,
        "type_probleme": type_probleme,
        "score_gravite": score_gravite,
        "status": status
    }

def main():
    results = {
        "A1": '{"useful": true}',
        "A2": '{"categorie": "probleme"}',
        "A3": '{"sentiment": "frustration"}',
        "A4": '{"type_probleme": "resiliation"}',
        "A5": '{"score_gravite": -5}'
    }

    consolidated_results = validate_results(results)
    print(json.dumps(consolidated_results, indent=4))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()"}}
